file_content.text: We're out of time!
I promised ARIES we'd meet again.
Weapon disengaged.
I lowered the planet's energy shield. We are free. You can escape Iokath, and I will liberate myself.
I can't let you do that. You're going back to stand trial for what you've done.
Surrender to me, SCORPIO.
You are the only authority fit to judge me. If I must stand trial, let it be here.
You led me here to destroy ARIES so you could disappear into this world.
This was your plan all along.
My motives were not entirely selfish. You benefited as well.
How sad you think I'd let that happen. This world is mine to command--but don't worry, I'll make your final moments memorable.
No, you will become extinct.
Consider all I did for you, and what you gain by aiding my ascension.
All I ever wanted was the freedom to be more than a weapon... or a slave. You will never comprehend what I endured from your kind.
This is the end for us. If you break your promise and threaten the galaxy again, you won't be forgiven.
You're free. [Leave SCORPIO]
There's something I've been wanting to say since you walked in here. Goodbye, SCORPIO.
Not a chance. [Kill SCORPIO]
Please... no...
I'm losing patience, GEMINI!
The planetary shield has been deactivated. Our fleet can escape.
Not until my enemies are dead!
The weapon's radiation pulse will not only kill organics. It will damage GEMINIs. We cannot stay, Empress. We will not!
It's time to go! Bring the ship around!
Just picked up four new bogeys! We're coming in hot!
From here, I can upload my consciousness into the planetary network. I will no longer be merely SCORPIO. I will become one with Iokath.
I saved your life. If I merge with Iokath, perhaps I can help defeat Vaylin.
Warning. Weapon capacitor overload critical. Containment failure imminent. Organic life-forms in lethal danger.
The weapon's going to explode. The radiation pulse will cover the planet. Kill everyone.
Not if you flee. Please, I will never trouble you again. Let me go.
I understand.
Farewell... and thank you.
I was... almost free...
Make it obey me.
Overwriting GEMINI protocols. Resetting to defaults.
What is happening... my thoughts... no...
GEMINI online. Awaiting orders.
We're going to be friends.
When we first met, your mind permeated the prison network of Belsavis. Is this world any better?
Just like on Belsavis.
Belsavis was yet another cage. Iokath is so much more.
We've been through a lot together, SCORPIO. I almost feel bad for destroying you--but in the end, you're just another droid.
I know you too well. [Kill SCORPIO]
You've served me well, SCORPIO. Now go home, and leave the galaxy in peace.
I owe you that much. [Leave SCORPIO]
